name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access using a malicious script. Mitigations include killing the malicious process, isolating the infected host, and scanning for additional threats.

parallel--0c5d5c3a-c5f0-4b39-af31-395345.name: Mitigate Malicious Activity
parallel--0c5d5c3a-c5f0-4b39-af31-395345.description: Perform multiple actions to mitigate the malicious activity.

action--f47b3fcd-dbbf-4fc9-a92c-9b1f4655.name: Kill Malicious Process
action--f47b3fcd-dbbf-4fc9-a92c-9b1f4655.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--d58e435c-da6a-4069-a62a-5cfe576c.name: Isolate Infected Host
action--d58e435c-da6a-4069-a62a-5cfe576c.description: Remove the infected host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

loop--5e3f15f1-1755-4c6b-aaf6-0cb6ca7b93.name: Scan for Additional Malicious Scripts
loop--5e3f15f1-1755-4c6b-aaf6-0cb6ca7b93.description: Continuously scan for additional malicious scripts until the scan is clean.

action--5e3f15f1-1755-4c6b-aaf6-0cb6ca7b.name: Run Scan
action--5e3f15f1-1755-4c6b-aaf6-0cb6ca7b.description: Run a scan for additional malicious scripts.

scan_is_clean.description: Indicates whether the scan is clean.
